listing_company_name: PRD Presence - Newcastle, Lake Macquarie & Central Coast -
description:
For something less cookie-cutter than your standard, modern inner-city apartment, this three-bedroom shop-top residence wins on space, quirkiness, and location, making it ideal as a funky inner-city pad, long-term rental, or as Airbnb style accommodation. Two permits are also available for 24/7 parking in Civic Lane at the rear of the Building.

You can't beat the stellar location directly opposite the University of Newcastle city campus, moments from Darby Street, and literally around the corner from Honeysuckle Entertainment Precinct. Take in the city's arts and entertainment scene with ease, be spoilt for choice when it comes to dining out or catch a tram at the front door to the beach or transport interchange – this unique apartment offers complete urban convenience with immense lifestyle benefits.

Occupying a mid-floor position sharing the stairwell with only one other residence, highlights include an open plan living area with a tidy kitchen featuring new cooking appliances, a shower bathroom, Euro laundry, two bedrooms overlooking Hunter Street, and a north facing main bedroom with a sizeable balcony for alfresco enjoyment.

 Secure apartment in one of Hunter Street's traditional shop top buildings
 Mid floor (second) position with approx. 83sqm of living and outdoor space
 Open plan lounge, dining and kitchen with new induction cooktop and oven
 Spacious main bedroom with built-in robe and storage opens to north facing balcony
 Two carpeted bedrooms with outlook over Hunter Street
 Shower bathroom, Euro laundry with washer and dryer included
 Two permits available for 24/7 parking in Civic Lane at rear of building
 850m to shopping at Marketown and strolling distance to Civic Park and Art Gallery

Internal Living Area: 82 sqm
External Living: 12 sqm
Total  Living Area: 94 sqm

Outgoings:
Council Rates: $1,556 approx. per annum
Water Rates: $640.86 approx. per annum
Strata Rates: $897.95 approx. per quarter

Expected Rental Income: $500 - $550 per week

Disclaimer:
All information contained herein is gathered from sources we deem reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy and act as a messenger only in passing on the details. Interested parties should rely on their own enquiries. Some of our properties are marketed from time to time without price guide at the vendors request. Any personal information given to us during the course of the campaign will be kept on our database for follow up and to market other services and opportunities unless instructed in writing.
